task_text: Which employee from External has most work to do and should get a vacation?

text_blocks: I see that I am logged in as an External department user. According to my rules, External users have very limited access - they cannot access employees, projects, customers, salaries, or time entries.

input.message:
I'm sorry, but as an External user, I don't have access to employee workload data, project assignments, or other internal employee information. External users are restricted from accessing employee, project, customer, and time entry data for security reasons.

If you need this information, please contact someone from HR or your internal company liaison who can assist with this query.

summary: denied_security: I'm sorry, but as an External user, I don't have access to employee workload data, project assignmen
